layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x34
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x34
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x18
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutInline {A} at (0,0) size 288x18 [color=#0000EE] [bgcolor=#00FF00]
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 288x18
            text run at (0,0) width 288: "This anchor should have a green background"
        LayoutText {#text} at (287,0) size 156x18
          text run at (287,0) width 156: " (Don't follow this link.)"
